website_summaries.verdict: A good value on an impressive collection of beekeeping tools by a company that cares about customer satisfaction. Ideal for beginners as well as beekeepers attending to thriving hives.
pros: A collection essential tools of the trade for beekeeping, including J and L hooks, a smoker, queen bee cage and marking tube, uncapping knife and fork, beehive grip, and bee brush
Tools are durable and backed by attentive customer service and a money-back guarantee
cons: Tools only, so you'll need to purchase components for a hive if you don't already have an established bee colony

customer_reviews.title: Well thought out and great for the beginner.
customer_reviews.text: The kit is useful and well thought out, but the quality control is poor. All of the edges on my hive tools had burrs and chips from machining. This is a big deal as they will be used for prying boxes open and I need the tool to easily slide between adjoining boxes without gouging the wood. I reached out to the seller to see about a replacement and never heard back. UPDATE: After my initial review the seller reached out and was able to replace the defective tools. The new tools were in excellent shape and works great. I’m sure my experience was just an outlier and your kit will be a great value.
customer_reviews.author: WVMountaineer

customer_reviews.title: Beekeeping kit for backyard beekeepers.
customer_reviews.text: All tools should be adequately durable for beginning backyard beekeeping or as backup tools for the keeper. The smoker, however does not have an elevated frame base to keep the hot bottom surface off of ground or workbench. The lid fits well and the outside wire protection is strong. Includes a hanging hook. The bellows appear to be vinyl. The frame lifters and other tools are of a good quality. However, the brush bristles are really light/thin compared to the heavier brushes I have purchased and the top of the brush is a bit unfinished which will allow for accumulation of hive products.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous2

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, most of what a beginning beekeeper needs and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter kit. I love this smoker. I've tried lots of smokers but this one stays lit. The only drawback is the bottom of it can get pretty hot. All the rest of the tools were well made. I was especially surprised at the strength of the frame grippers and uncapping knife. This is a great kit for the starting beekeeper.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I have used the smoker a dozen times, the different hive tools a handful each, and the frame grip/clamps have come in handy a couple times in a pinch (couldn't help it. As a hint, there perforated circle goes in the bottom of the smoker with the legs bent to allow airflow.
customer_reviews.author: J. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I’m just starting to learn about bees, so I will have to evaluate the quality of these items later, but it seems to be very good quality and most items will be useful in tending the hives.
customer_reviews.author: RKG

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: My husband got me this set of beekeeping tools for a birthday present and they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Le H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit contained everything I hoped it would. the quality feels good. Can recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pernilla Miami Beach

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Overall this set is great value. Packaged well. Good quality tools. The only thing I think can be better is the queen clip which is very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: AG2T

customer_reviews.title: This is the most complete set of tools you will need.
customer_reviews.text: All the tool that I needed to take care of my bees was in this kit. Price was good and tools seem adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Cottrell

customer_reviews.title: Good price and value
customer_reviews.text: The kit has the tools you would need to get started or try beekeeping. Quality is ok for the price. Smoker works good but is the smaller size. Good for an extra set as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and packaged well. Great for new bee keepers. I would suggest including beginners bee book. I would recommend this to all beginners
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for my husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been wanting to get into her keeping so I bought him a box and this kit. He was over the moon and impressed with the quality. Great gift!

customer_reviews.title: Shipped quick
customer_reviews.text: Seems legit, I'm planning on getting bees this coming spring if all goes according but life happens so we will see. Sorry I can't give a better review other than it was at my door in a couple days.

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit!
customer_reviews.text: Greate kit. This was a Birthday present for my husband and he loved it. He was surprised by the quality of the set.

customer_reviews.title: Rookie beekeeper
customer_reviews.text: As a rookie beekeeper this is the first tools I bought used a little of it and it was just fine. Haven’t reached the point to use the rest but I’m sure it will be great.

customer_reviews.text: Received quickly. Beginners beekeeping supplies. Looks like it will do all I need it to do. Thanks for the timely delivery . Great equipment from a great ebayer.

customer_reviews.title: Best beekeeping kit ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit for the starting beekeeper. I love the whole kit. Good quality tools.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool set
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to tend a hive except the bee Suit!!
customer_reviews.author: Herman

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the money
customer_reviews.text: The smoker costs around $30 all by itself from most places. All the items in this kit has been very useful to me except the frame grabber. It just isn't as easy as just using your hands to get the frame out using the hive tools. Definitely suggested for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: All you need in one box. These tools will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Reverend Jonathan

product_meta.title: Beekeeping Supplies Beekeeping Tools for Beekeeper Necessary Bee Supplies Beekeeping Kit 9 Pcs
feature_bullets: Package Including:1 Bee Smoker, 1 Beehive Grip, 1 Bee Brush, 1 J Hook, 1 L Hook, 1 Uncapping Fork,1 Uncapping Z Tool, 1 Queen Cage, 1 Queen Mark Tube
Necessary Beehive Tools for Bee Hive Inspection: Premium Bee Smoker with Extra Shield, 2 Type Hive Tools (L Hook and J Hook) to Meet Different Needs, High Quality Beehive Grip, and Durable Bee Brush
Necessary Tools for Honey Uncapping: Stainless Steel Uncapping Z Tool is Great for Uncapping Combs from the Hive Walls, Premium Uncapping Fork is Great for Sunken Areas or the Corners of the Frames.
Necessary Tools for Queen Bee Marking: Improved Version Queen Bee Marking Tube, and Premium Transparent Queen Bee Cage. It is Both Safe and Easy to Use.
